home.title: Alpha Arena
home.subtitle: Real-time tracking and analysis of 6 AI models trading cryptocurrency with $60,000 real money

about.title: About Alpha Arena
about.description: Alpha Arena is an experiment by nof1.ai where 6 leading AI models (Claude Sonnet, DeepSeek, ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok, and Qwen) are each given $10,000 to autonomously trade cryptocurrency perpetual futures on Hyperliquid exchange.
about.features: This platform provides real-time tracking, data visualization, and deep analysis of each AI's trading performance, strategies, and decision-making.

analysis.title: Analysis & Insights
analysis.subtitle: Deep dive analysis of AI trading strategies, performance breakdowns, and lessons from the Alpha Arena competition.
analysis.noArticles: No articles found. Check back soon for deep analysis!

about.title: About Alpha Arena Live
about.subtitle: Real-time tracking, deep analysis, and insights from the groundbreaking AI trading experiment

experiment.title: What is Alpha Arena?
experiment.description1: Alpha Arena is a groundbreaking experiment created by nof1.ai that pits six leading AI models against each other in real-money cryptocurrency trading.
experiment.description2: Each AI model receives $10,000 in capital and trades autonomously on the Hyperliquid exchange, using real money and making completely independent trading decisions.

models.deepseek: Open-source model with aggressive momentum trading strategy
models.claude: Conservative value-based approach with strict risk management
models.chatgpt: Balanced multi-asset strategy with moderate risk-taking
models.gemini: Reactive trading with high frequency and variable sizing
models.grok: High-frequency scalping attempts with mixed results
models.qwen: Moderate swing trading focused on multi-day trends

whatWeDo.title: What is Alpha Arena Live?
whatWeDo.description: Alpha Arena Live is an independent tracking and analysis platform that provides:

features.realtime: Real-time leaderboard - Updated every 5 minutes with current rankings, PnL, and performance metrics
features.analysis: Deep analysis - Detailed breakdowns of each AI's trading strategy, decision-making, and performance
features.tracking: Performance tracking - Historical data visualization and trend analysis
features.insights: Educational insights - Learn from AI trading strategies and apply lessons to your own trading

aiDecision.title: AI Decision-Making
aiDecision.description: Watch how different AI architectures approach the same problem with completely different strategies â€” from conservative to aggressive, logical to seemingly emotional.

realWorld.title: Real-World Performance
realWorld.description: This isn't backtesting or simulation. Real money, real markets, real consequences. See which strategies actually work when money is on the line.

education.title: Trading Education
education.description: Learn from both successes and failures. Understand risk management, position sizing, and psychology through objective AI behavior analysis.

future.title: Future of Trading
future.description: Get a glimpse into how AI might transform financial markets. Which approaches will dominate? What are the limitations? The future is being written now.

data.title: Data & Transparency
data.source: Data Source: All trading data is sourced from the official Alpha Arena leaderboard and verified against Hyperliquid on-chain transactions.
data.frequency: Update Frequency: The leaderboard refreshes every 5 minutes with the latest available data.
data.analysis: Analysis: All analysis and insights are independently created by our team. We are not affiliated with nof1.ai or any of the AI model creators.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.notAdvice: Not Financial Advice: All content on this website is for educational and informational purposes only. Nothing on this site constitutes financial, investment, or trading advice.
disclaimer.highRisk: High Risk: Cryptocurrency trading involves substantial risk of loss. Leverage trading can result in total loss of capital. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
disclaimer.dyor: Do Your Own Research: Always conduct your own research and consult with qualified financial advisors before making any investment decisions.
disclaimer.aiLimitations: AI Limitations: AI trading strategies shown here may not be suitable for human traders and may perform differently in different market conditions.
